summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of additional assets related to Epstein. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, communicates with Janet Young and Lisa Hurd about the transfer of securities to Pershing, LLC. The email includes details about specific securities and their trade dates.
